description: A style of coordinating vivid, bright colors, known as "dopamine colors." It is said that wearing bright clothes releases dopamine, improves mood, gives a sense of happiness, and boosts confidence. "Chuanda" means coordination or outfit. "Candy color system" is a synonym.

examples.chinese: 多巴胺穿搭,减龄又有活力
examples.translation: Dopamine dressing makes you look younger and more energetic.

examples.chinese: 多巴胺穿搭真的好有朝气的感觉
examples.translation: Dopamine dressing really gives a feeling of vitality.

examples.chinese: 多巴胺穿搭好好看,家人陪伴也是相当幸福
examples.translation: Dopamine dressing looks great, and having family company is also quite happy.
